description: This is the protocol to prepare Primer ID MiSeq sequencing library. Viral RNA was first extracted using QIAamp viral RNA extraction kit.  The block of random nucleotides (Ns) in the cDNA primers served as the Primer ID. The Superscript III kit was used for the cDNA synthesis. We used two rounds of PCR to amplify the cDNA and incorporate Illumina indexed adapters with KAPA2G Robust and KAPA HiFi PCR kits, respectively.
protocol_affiliation: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

authors_list.name: Shuntai Zhou
authors_list.affiliation: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

guidelines:
Viral RNA extraction using QIAamp vRNA mini kit.

Note: Primer ID primer and forward primer use random bases. Indexed primers have 24 fixed barcodes.

 

Table of Indexed Primers
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data:
For multiplexing sequencing, first, prepare Primer Mix.

Example (For HIV drug resistance pipeline). 

Regions

DR cDNA primer

DR F primer

PR

R2614_PID

F2163AD

RT

R3284_PID11

F2620_AD

INT

R4752_PID11

F4383_AD

V3

V3R_Buni_11

V1F_AD


Make 10 µM primer mix: mix 10 µL of each primer in one set and 60 µL of dH2O. 

 

Primer Tables

primer

sequence (5'-3')

R2614_PID

GTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATCTNNNNNNNNNCAGTTTAACTTTTGGGCCATCCATTCC

R3284_PID11

GTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATCTNNNNNNNNNNNCAGTCACTATAGGCTGTACTGTCCATTTATC

R4752_PID11

GTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATCTNNNNNNNNNNNATCGAATACTGCCATTTGTACTGC

R7209_PID11

GTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATCTNNNNNNNNNNNCAGTCCATTTTGCTYTAYTRABVTTACAATRTGC

F2163AD

GCCTCCCTCGCGCCATCAGAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAGNNNNTCAGAGCAGACCAGAGCCAACAGCCCCA

F2620_AD

GCCTCCCTCGCGCCATCAGAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAGNNNNGGCCATTGACAGAAGAAAAAATAAAAGC

F4383_AD

GCCTCCCTCGCGCCATCAGAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAGNNNNAAAAGGAGAAGCCATGCATG

V1F_AD

GCCTCCCTCGCGCCATCAGAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAGNNNNTTATGGGATCAAAGCCTAAAGCCATGTGTA

 

“N” in this Primer table is a random nucleotide.

 

P1

AATGATACGGCGACCACCGAGATCTACACGCCTCCCTCGCGCCATCAGAGATGTG

Indexed Adapter

CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATNNNNNNGTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTC

ADPT_2a

GTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTC

The 6 “N”s are not random nucleotides. They are a set of 24 pre-designed indexed sequences.

components.data:
Purify cDNA using Agencourt RNAClean XP. 

Resuspend the beads and take an aliquot out. Keep at room temperature for at least 30 minutes before use. (Should be in 1ml aliquots)
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Purify cDNA using Agencourt RNAClean XP. 

Resuspend the beads and take an aliquot out. Keep at room temperature for at least 30 minutes before use. (Should be in 1ml aliquots)

components.data: Purification
components.name: Section

components.data: Transfer the cDNA reactions into 1.7 mL RNase-free tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the cDNA reactions into 1.7 mL RNase-free tubes.

components.data: Resuspend the beads (Vortex). Add 42 µl of beads to 60 µl cDNA (Ratio: 0.6 – 0.8) Agencourt RNAClean XP beads to each cDNA reaction.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend the beads (Vortex). Add 42 µl of beads to 60 µl cDNA (Ratio: 0.6 – 0.8) Agencourt RNAClean XP beads to each cDNA reaction.

components.data: Mix the Agencourt RNAClean XP and sample thoroughly by pipette mixing 15 times. No vortexing. Let the tube incubate at room temperature for 20 minutes before proceeding to the next step.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix the Agencourt RNAClean XP and sample thoroughly by pipette mixing 15 times. No vortexing. Let the tube incubate at room temperature for 20 minutes before proceeding to the next step.

components.data: Place the tube onto the magnetic tube rack for 5 minutes to separate the beads from solution.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place the tube onto the magnetic tube rack for 5 minutes to separate the beads from solution.

components.data: Slowly aspirate the cleared solution from the tube and discard. This step should be performed while the tube is situated on the rack. Do not disturb the magnetic beads, which have formed a spot on the side of the tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Slowly aspirate the cleared solution from the tube and discard. This step should be performed while the tube is situated on the rack. Do not disturb the magnetic beads, which have formed a spot on the side of the tube.

components.data:
Dispense 500 μL of 70% ethanol into the tube and incubate for 30 seconds at room temperature. Aspirate out the ethanol and discard. (1/3) 

 

It is important to perform this step with the tube situated on the rack. Do not disturb the separated magnetic beads. Be sure to remove all of the ethanol from the bottom of the well as it may contain residual contaminants.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Dispense 500 μL of 70% ethanol into the tube and incubate for 30 seconds at room temperature. Aspirate out the ethanol and discard. (1/3) 

 

It is important to perform this step with the tube situated on the rack. Do not disturb the separated magnetic beads. Be sure to remove all of the ethanol from the bottom of the well as it may contain residual contaminants.

components.data:
Dispense 500 μL of 70% ethanol into the tube and incubate for 30 seconds at room temperature. Aspirate out the ethanol and discard. (2/3) 

 

It is important to perform this step with the tube situated on the rack. Do not disturb the separated magnetic beads. Be sure to remove all of the ethanol from the bottom of the well as it may contain residual contaminants.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Dispense 500 μL of 70% ethanol into the tube and incubate for 30 seconds at room temperature. Aspirate out the ethanol and discard. (2/3) 

 

It is important to perform this step with the tube situated on the rack. Do not disturb the separated magnetic beads. Be sure to remove all of the ethanol from the bottom of the well as it may contain residual contaminants.

components.data: Let the reaction tube air-dry 10 minutes on the rack with the cap open. The tube(s) should air-dry until the last visible traces of ethanol evaporate. Over drying the sample may result in a lower recovery.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Let the reaction tube air-dry 10 minutes on the rack with the cap open. The tube(s) should air-dry until the last visible traces of ethanol evaporate. Over drying the sample may result in a lower recovery.

components.name: Description

source_data.description: (Optional for clinical samples) Elute in 60 µl water. Repeat step 12 to 19.

components.data: Before gel purification, run 2 µl products on 1% agarose gel to check the bands.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Before gel purification, run 2 µl products on 1% agarose gel to check the bands.

components.data: Gel Purification and quantification
components.name: Section

components.data:
Gel purification.  (Qiagen QIAquick gel extraction kit)

Run 2nd round PCR products on 1.2% agarose gel. E = 4 V/cm, T = 60 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Gel purification.  (Qiagen QIAquick gel extraction kit)

Run 2nd round PCR products on 1.2% agarose gel. E = 4 V/cm, T = 60 min.

components.data: Excise DNA fragment.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Excise DNA fragment.

components.data: Weight the gel; add 3 volume of Buffer QG to 1 volume of gel.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Weight the gel; add 3 volume of Buffer QG to 1 volume of gel.

components.data: Incubate at 50 ˚C for 10 minutes to completing dissolve. Vortex every 2-3 minutes to help dissolve.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 50 ˚C for 10 minutes to completing dissolve. Vortex every 2-3 minutes to help dissolve.

components.data: Check the color of gel solution (should be yellow, otherwise add 10 µl 3M sodium acetate).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Check the color of gel solution (should be yellow, otherwise add 10 µl 3M sodium acetate).

components.data: Place MinElute column, apply the sample to the column and centrifuge for 1 minute.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place MinElute column, apply the sample to the column and centrifuge for 1 minute.

components.data: Add 500 µl buffer QG and centrifuge for 1 minute.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500 µl buffer QG and centrifuge for 1 minute.

components.data: Add 0.75 ml buffer PE, incubate for 5 minutes at room temperature, centrifuge for 1 minute.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 0.75 ml buffer PE, incubate for 5 minutes at room temperature, centrifuge for 1 minute.

components.data: Discard the fluid, centrifuge for additional 3 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard the fluid, centrifuge for additional 3 minutes.

components.data: Put the column in a new 1.7 ml tube, add 10 µl buffer EB. Stand for 4 minutes, centrifuge for 2 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Put the column in a new 1.7 ml tube, add 10 µl buffer EB. Stand for 4 minutes, centrifuge for 2 minutes.

components.data: Quantification using Invitrogen Qubit dsDNA BR Assay kit. See Qubit dsDNA BR assay protocol. Don’t use Nanodrop to quantify!
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quantification using Invitrogen Qubit dsDNA BR Assay kit. See Qubit dsDNA BR assay protocol. Don’t use Nanodrop to quantify!

components.data: After quantification, pool libraries in equal amount. Use AMPure XP beads to purify pooled libraries (2:3, two washes), elute in 20 to 30 µL Elution Buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After quantification, pool libraries in equal amount. Use AMPure XP beads to purify pooled libraries (2:3, two washes), elute in 20 to 30 µL Elution Buffer.

components.data: Quantify the pooled library using Qubit dsDNA BR assay kit. Check the quality of the library by Agilent Bioanalyzer or Bio-rad Experion. Repeat purification if primer dimmer is present (~200bp).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quantify the pooled library using Qubit dsDNA BR assay kit. Check the quality of the library by Agilent Bioanalyzer or Bio-rad Experion. Repeat purification if primer dimmer is present (~200bp).

components.data: Place the tube on ice for 1'.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place the tube on ice for 1'.
